title: Dionne Fields Talk Show 22: Honoring : Rain Fields
description: Dionne Fields Talk Show Season 3 and Episode 22 Rain Fields Rain was my youngest volunteer since January 3; 1999. Rain is also my youngest son. He was only 1 years old when he started volunteering. Now Rain is 9 years old and in the fourth grade. He is excited about his new upcoming charity for kids. This Television network would be about new heroes, silent heroes. Our women, men, and children volunteering each day. In our community making a better world for us all. My main reason for having, my own show was to spotlight youth volunteers
author: Dionne L  Fields
